TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi RichTextBox extends System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase implements class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild
Public Class RichTextBox Inherits TextBoxBase Implements IAddChild

summary.span: 表示对 对象执行操作的丰富编辑控件。

span.span: Represents a rich editing control which operates on objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是的唯一受支持的子元素。 is the only supported child element for a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 已为冒泡的内置处理和事件。 has built-in handling for the bubbling and events. 因此，自定义事件处理程序，侦听`MouseUp`或`MouseDown`事件从永远不会调用。Consequently, custom event handlers that listen for `MouseUp` or `MouseDown` events from a will never be called. 如果你需要对这些事件做出响应，侦听隧道和事件相反，或注册处理程序替换（后面这个选项才可通过代码） 的自变量。If you need to respond to these events, listen for the tunneling and events instead, or register the handlers with the argument (this latter option is only available through code). 不要标记处理除非有意想要禁用的事件本机处理这些事件，并请注意这产生显著影响控件的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。Do not mark the event handled unless you deliberately want to disable native handling of these events, and be aware that this has notable effects on the control's [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]. 虽然支持复制和粘贴的映像，某些情况下当前不受支持，可能无法正常工作。While supports copying and pasting of images, certain scenarios are currently unsupported and may not work properly. 下表总结了这些方案和预期的结果。The following table summarizes these scenarios and expected results. |图像复制源Image Copy Source|图像粘贴结果Image Paste Result| |-----------------------|------------------------| |映像源是图形图元文件Image source is a graphic metafile|没有粘贴图像No image is pasted| |映像源使用相对路径或链接Image source uses relative path or link|粘贴出现乱码或空白图像Garbled or blank image is pasted| |映像源链接结尾不是预期的图像格式 (。PNG。JPG、。GIF)Image source link does not end with an expected image format (.PNG, .JPG, .GIF)|粘贴出现乱码或空白图像Garbled or blank image is pasted| |复制格式不正确格式文本 (RTF) 从图像源Image source copied from malformed RichText (RTF)|指向图像源会粘贴任何内容 （而不是图像）Link to image source is pasted (rather than image)| 粘贴到的 HTML 内容可能导致意外行为，因为使用 RTF 格式，而不是直接使用 HTML 格式。Pasting HTML content into a might result in unexpected behavior because uses RTF format rather than directly using HTML format. 文本始终将包装在。Text always wraps in a . 如果您不希望文本环绕然后将其设置上要大于的宽度。If you do not want text to wrap then set the on the to be larger than the width of the . 但是，一旦达到页面宽度文本仍会换行。However, once the page width is reached the text still wraps. 水平和垂直对齐中的内容，可使用和属性。Horizontally and vertically aligning content within a is done with the and properties. 对齐页的布局中，可使用和属性。Aligning the within the layout of the page is done with the and properties. 滚动条上不可见默认情况下。Scrollbars are not visible on a by default. 若要使滚动条可见，请设置属性或。To make a scrollbar visible, set the property to or . 通常情况下，用于检测何时事件中的文本或更改，而不是正如所料。Usually, the event should be used to detect when the text in a or changes, rather then as you might expect. 有关示例，请参阅[如何： 在文本框中已更改检测时的文本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-detect-when-text-in-a-textbox-has-changed.md)。For an example, see [How to: Detect When Text in a TextBox Has Changed](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-detect-when-text-in-a-textbox-has-changed.md). 支持多种键盘命令。 supports a variety of keyboard commands. 有关键盘命令的列表，请参阅。For a list of keyboard commands, see . 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下面的示例声明，该字符串包含一个简单。The following example declares a that contains a simple . [!code-xaml[RichTextBoxSnippets#_RTB_XAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RichTextBoxSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_rtb_xaml)] [!code-csharp[RichTextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#RichTextBoxCodeOnlyExample](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RichTextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/CSharp/RichTextBoxExample.cs#richtextboxcodeonlyexample)] [!code-vb[RichTextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#RichTextBoxCodeOnlyExample](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RichTextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/visualbasic/richtextboxexample.vb#richtextboxcodeonlyexample)]
